item.value: Alaska is the largest state in America.
There are more than 2,700 languages in the world. There are also more than 7,000 dialects. A dialect is a regional language variation with different pronunciation, vocabulary, or meaning.
The creator of the first working light bulb was Joseph Wilson Swan.
The Chinese invented eyeglasses. Marco Polo reported seeing many pairs worn by the Chinese as early as 1275, 500 years before lens griding became an art in the West.
The earth is the 3rd planet from the sun and is the 5th largest planet in our solar system.
The shortfin Mako shark is the fastest fish, it can swim at 50 kilometres per hour. Olympic gold-medal swimmers could not escape even if they tried, they can only swim at 8 kph (5 mph) .
The blue whale is the largest known animal on Earth. The second largest animal is the Afican elephant.
The longest word in a major English dictionary is 'Pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis'. It is 45 characters long.
On July 20, 1969, Neil Armstrong became the first human to step on the moon.
The biggest planet in the Solar System is Jupiter. It is 317 times as heavy as the earth
The tallest building in America is the Willius Tower in Chicago.
Mount McKinley in Alaska is the highest mountain in America. It is 20,320 ft high. Alaska is also the largest state in America, it is 656,425 square miles in size.
The tallest woman was Zeng Jinlian. She was 2.48 meters ( 8ft 2in ) tall.

Alexander Graham Bell is credited with inventing the first telephone in 1876. By 2008 there were almost 1.3 billions land lines in the world. China had more than 350 million phones, more than any other country.
The blue whale can produce the loudest sound of any living animal. The sound can be detected as far away as 530 miles.
The explosion of Mount Tambora, on Sumbawa island, Indonesia in 1815 was heard 2,600 km (1,600 mi) away and has been called the loudest sound ever heard by humans.
The shortest person in the world is Khagendra Thapa Maga. He is 56 cm ( 22 in ) tall.
The moon is 384,400 km from earth. If you travelled to the Moon in a plane it would take about 16 days. It takes 3 days in a spaceship to get there.
The banana tree is not actually a tree, it is a herb. It bears fruit once a year and then dies.
There are 206 bones in the adult human body and are 300 in children. As children age some bones fuse together.
